attributes.action: Ask Ray Morgan of Woking Borough council to step down from his position.
attributes.additional_details: He is one of four chief executives on a building firm which was given the go ahead by Wokin Borough council to start work in workings Victoria square again a conflict of interest
attributes.background: Ray Morgan is a chief executive on Woking Borough council and has to remain impartial and neutral but in this case he hasn't as it has been published in a local paper that he has tried to supply material for political purposes to the conservative party not exactly neutral !!
